content:
Throughout the story, Filon's relationship with Jean is portrayed as a close and supportive one. Jean is described as being one of Filon's closest friends, and the two are frequently seen spending time together both on and off the job. Jean is also described as being one of Filon's most dedicated trainees, with Filon noting that she is a quick learner and is always willing to put in the extra work to improve her skills as a tram driver.

Filon is also shown to be a supportive mentor to Jean, offering her guidance and advice when she needs it and providing her with constructive feedback to help her improve. Despite their close relationship, Filon is also portrayed as being a strict instructor, pushing Jean to be her best and holding her to high standards. Despite this, Jean appears to hold Filon in high regard, often expressing admiration for his skills and dedication to his work.

As the story progresses, Filon and Jean's relationship becomes more complex as Filon's powers and past are revealed. Jean's reactions to Filon's powers are mixed, initially being surprised and even scared by them, but eventually accepting them and understanding the reasons for why Filon keep them hidden. In the end, Filon's relationship with Jean remains strong and supportive, with Jean continuing to stand by his side and support him even as Filon takes on a leadership role in Liyue.
